basics.name: Ha Dong
basics.label: Undergraduate Student
basics.summary: A passionate undergraduate student with a keen interest in biological and artificial intelligence

location.address: 16 Barrett Hill Dr, 0393 Keefe Campus Center

work.name: Trapani Lab, Neuroscience Department, Amherst College
work.position: Gregory S. Call Research Fellow / Thesis Student
work.summary: Investigating the neural encoding of long latency and short latency C-start startles in zebrafish (Danio rerio) using high-speed video and electrophysiology.

work.name: Meister Lab, Biology and Biological Engineering Department, California Institute of Technology
work.summary: Studied naturalistic hunting behaviors in mice using multi-channel electrophysiology, behavioral recording, and machine learning.

work.name: Murthy Lab, Center for Brain Science, Harvard University
work.summary: Developing reinforcement learning models for understanding odor-guided trail following behavior in mice and studying the role of multimodal sensory integration during reward search

work.name: Meiler Lab, Chemistry Department, Vanderbilt University
work.summary: Co-authored WelQrate, a comprehensive open-source library with high-quality HTS datasets and novel graph featurization methods for drug discovery
highlights: Co-authored two publications on NeurIPS 2024 and JCIM

teaching and campus involvement.summary: Organize events and community activities for 100+ students in the Dudley House community.
Launched journal clubs, 'Lunch with Professors' series, and computational biology workshops to engage students in life-science research.
Provided peer-to-peer coaching on learning strategies, time management, and study motivation to 200+ students.

teaching and campus involvement.organization: Biology, Physics & Mathematics Departments, Amherst College
teaching and campus involvement.summary: Assisted in labs, office hours, and grading; tutored 1-on-1 students across introductory to advanced STEM courses.

projects.name: Does HMAX Subject to MÃ¼ller-Lyer Illusion? @ Harvard Neuro240
projects.summary: Trained an SVM on HMAX embeddings for length classification and evaluated its performance on an illusion dataset, observing human-like perceptual biases.

projects.name: Forecasting Bioactivity: Building Predictive Models for Drug Discovery @ Alkermes Plc
projects.summary: Collaborated on generating ensemble models for bioactivity endpoints targeting serotonin and dopamine receptors using ChEMBL data during my internship.

projects.name: Biology Focus Group @ Amherst College Biology Department DEI Committee
projects.summary: Led research and data analysis on access to learning for underrepresented students; conducted 10+ focus groups informing departmental pedagogical improvements.

projects.name: Biology For All Vietnam
projects.summary: Founded a non-profit that delivered free advanced biology courses to 23 high schools, resulting in 78 national and 3 international Olympiad medals.
